item.title: NPC Dialogue help
item.dc:creator: @IhvTay IhvTay
item.description:
@IhvTay wrote:

Using Project Insanity with Netty;
So im making a tutorial island, and when I click on the survival expert to continue (with the shrimp in my inv) no dialogue comes up so the player can’t continue.
my code is like this:

case 943://Survival Expert if (c.serenTut == 1) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(102, i); c.getItems().addItem(1351, 1); c.getItems().addItem(590, 1); c.getItems().addItem(303, 1); c.serenTut = 2; } else if (c.serenTut == 2) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(315, 1)) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(106, i); c.tutorial = 3; } else { c.sendMessage("You need to cook some shrimp and have it in your inventory to continue!"); } } break;

Read full topic
